definition: to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Most readers are probably familiar with the Dilbert comic strip.
sentences.chinese: 很多读者可能对Dilbert连环画都很熟悉。

sentences.english: He Youzhi is the idol of several generations of Chinese readers of comic books.
sentences.chinese: 贺友直是中国几代连环画读者的偶像。

sentences.english: Manga is not read in the same way as, say, the Beano.
sentences.chinese: 看动漫和看Beano这样的连环画是不一样的。

sentences.english: They even put the story in comic books for kids.
sentences.chinese: 他们甚至把这个故事编进给小孩看的连环画里面。

sentences.english: West wall roughly divided into three groups, composition forms also used the form of comics .
sentences.chinese: 西壁大体分为三组，构图形式也采用连环画的形式。

sentences.english: I thought [it] was like comic books.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这部电影像是一本连环画。

sentences.english: Another form of cartooning is the comic strip.
sentences.chinese: 卡通的另外的表现形式是连环画。

sentences.english: My grandpa tony always wears in gray. He read me comic books.
sentences.chinese: 我姥爷托尼总喜欢穿灰色衣服，他常给我读连环画书。

sentences.english: Hergé wanted to draw cartoons about the Wild West of America.
sentences.chinese: 埃尔热希望这部连环画讲述美国西部蛮荒地区的故事。

definition: the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature, namely: A Dream of Red Mansions 紅樓夢|红楼梦[Hong2 lou2 Meng4], Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], Water Margin 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4], Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
novel in chapters, main format for long novels from the Ming onwards, with each chapter headed by a summary couplet
model theater (operas and ballets produced during the Cultural Revolution)
